data.eml:eml: First record of Alepia Enderlein (Diptera, Psychodidae) in Mexico, with the description of two new species

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Durán-Luz, Juana, Ibáñez-Bernal, Sergio, Sandoval-Ruiz, César Antonio (2018): First record of Alepia Enderlein (Diptera, Psychodidae) in Mexico, with the description of two new species. Zootaxa 4497 (4): 547-558, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4497.4.5
